segments.text: I notice the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and he’s stretching so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and it looks like it’s going to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting below, ready to catch whatever he drops—it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s just standing there like it’s not happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice or if this will just keep getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, even if it means falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a disaster waiting to happen, but it’s also kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how oblivious everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR
